name: Quantum Toaster
description:
Oh no! My toaster is a time machine!!!

A time traveling beat'em'up adventure, about a scientist from the 1920's who simply wished to create the perfect toaster. However, due to a little miscalculation, the toaster became a time traveling machine instead!

Now our protagonist is stuck in the future and has to find a way to return, while avoiding being caught by the time patrol!

Note: GAME ART IS PLACE HOLDER - Due to inconveniences, no art was developed for the game just yet. Only gameplay and game design have been implemented and developed. 

Features:

- Unique narrative focused on time traveling and comedy

- A toaster as a weapon???

- Classic style beat'em'up

Controls:

- WASD for movement;

- J for melee attack

- K for ranged attack

- L for special

Want to leave feedback in the game? Leave your opinion in our form!

Form https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScTtmBwg5S1xid2aFzmno6Dkwq6h4cD_niMx7LWVT6ZYRSnOg/viewform?usp=sf_link
